title: Custom attributes for Sitefinity Taxa
content:
Are your taxa too dumb?...want to give them some more data other than just description and synonyms? Well telerik thought you might, so the API is there...they just aren't using it yet :) I had a whole system of persisting values into the taxa description field via JSON, and it worked well...but in browsing the DB one day I noticed the table "sf\_taxa\_attrbutes".Â  The table contains 3 columns, taxaid, key, value (so a dictionary). I put in a ticket, and support wizard **Jen Peleva** asked around and turns out it literally is almost exactly what I was doing with JSON...and there's an API for it! (Confirmed future-safe by Boyan too) Check this out:
So in my case, I want to link imageIds, and other meta-data to taxa...and this is exactly what will let me do it :) Enjoy extending your taxa! Steve
seoDescription: Extend your sitefinity Taxa with custom attributes
